animals.name: Cow
animals.description: Large domesticated herbivores known for their production of milk.

animals.name: Cat
animals.description: Small carnivorous mammals kept as pets for companionship.

animals.name: Dog
animals.description: Domesticated carnivorous mammals known for their loyalty and companionship.

animals.name: Horse
animals.description: Large hoofed mammals used for riding, racing, and work purposes.

animals.name: Pig
animals.description: Domesticated omnivorous mammals raised for meat production.

animals.name: Sheep
animals.description: Domesticated ruminant mammals raised for their wool, meat, and milk.

animals.name: Goat
animals.description: Domesticated hoofed mammals raised for milk, meat, and fiber.

animals.name: Chicken
animals.description: Domesticated birds primarily kept for their eggs and meat.

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.description: Small mammals known for their long ears and hopping gait, often kept as pets.

animals.name: Hen
animals.description: Female domesticated chickens raised for egg production.
